name: Selft Gravity
description:
This game actually for Kenney Jam 2021, but i failed to upload on time :(

You have the ability to control your own gravity. Use this advantage to evade enemies.

Your goal is to find the red flag, so you can go to next stage. Unfortunately it is only has 1 stage right now :(

Use A and D to move.

Use Spacebar to jump.

Use Arrow key to change gravity.

Hope you guys like it. Please leave a comment. Enjoy!!!
